        Parameters:
        message -
        logEvent -
        ignoreLockedTopicForum - set true if you want to allow the message to be updated even if the topic or forum is locked (ie marking as read or commenting on a moderated message)

      • findAuthoredMessagesForStudent

        List<Message> findAuthoredMessagesForStudent(String studentId)
        Parameters:
        studentId - The id of the student whose authored messages we are searching for.
        Returns:
        A list of all of the messages that the student has authored and are not flagged as DRAFT or DELETED.

                                                    Long forumId)

      • findAuthoredMessageCountForAllStudents

        List<Object[]> findAuthoredMessageCountForAllStudents()
        Returns:
        Each item in the list will be an array consisting of two elements. The element at index 0 will correspond to the student's id and the element at index 1 will correspond to the number of messages that student has authored in the site.

        List<Object[]> findReadMessageCountForAllStudents()
        Returns:
        Each item in the list will be an array consisting of two elements. The element at index 0 will correspond to the student's id and the element at index 1 will correspond to the number of messages that student has read in the site.

      • findMessageCountsForMainPage

        List<Object[]> findMessageCountsForMainPage(Collection<Long> topicIds)
        Parameters:
        topicIds - The list of topic ids for which we want to gather the message counts.
        Returns:
        A list of arrays where each array will contain exactly two values. Index 0, a Long, will be the topicId and index 1, an Integer, will be the total number of messages under that topic (excluding any messages flagged as DRAFT or DELETED).

      • findReadMessageCountsForMainPage

        List<Object[]> findReadMessageCountsForMainPage(Collection<Long> topicIds)
        Parameters:
        topicIds - The list of topic ids for which we want to gather the message counts.
        Returns:
        A list of arrays where each array will contain exactly two values. Index 0, a Long, will be the topicId and index 1, an Integer, will be the total number of messages under that topic that the current user has read (excluding any messages flagged as DRAFT or DELETED).
